complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Setup Project Architecture and Repository' task into 6 subtasks, including the existing 4 subtasks plus 2 additional ones. Focus on comprehensive documentation and developer experience aspects.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple technical decisions and setup processes across version control, framework selection, environment configuration, and CI/CD. It already has 4 well-defined subtasks, but would benefit from additional subtasks covering documentation and developer onboarding.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Design Database Schema' task into 6 subtasks, including the existing 5 subtasks plus 1 additional one focused on database performance testing and optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Database schema design is highly complex with 10 interconnected entities requiring careful relationship modeling, indexing strategy, and migration planning. The existing 5 subtasks cover most aspects, but adding performance testing would complete the implementation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: The existing 5 subtasks for 'Implement User Authentication System' are comprehensive. Ensure they cover all security aspects including token management, password policies, and security testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Authentication is security-critical with many components: registration, login, password management, RBAC, and security hardening. The existing 5 subtasks already cover these areas comprehensively with appropriate dependencies.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Create Property Management Interface' task into 6 subtasks, including the existing 4 subtasks plus 2 additional ones focused on batch operations and advanced search/filtering capabilities.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This UI-heavy task requires multiple form components, validation, image handling, and data management. The existing 4 subtasks cover basic CRUD operations, but additional subtasks for batch operations and advanced search would enhance functionality.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Image Storage and Optimization' task into 5 subtasks, including the existing 4 subtasks plus 1 additional one focused on CDN integration and delivery optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves cloud storage integration, upload mechanisms, image processing, and frontend optimization. It has technical complexity in both backend processing and frontend performance considerations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Develop Property Showcase Generation System' task into 6 subtasks, including the existing 5 subtasks plus 1 additional one focused on showcase analytics and performance monitoring.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This feature is core to the application with multiple components: creation interface, URL generation, responsive templates, branding, and interaction features. It has high complexity due to its central role and dependencies on other systems.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Client Management System' task into 5 subtasks, including the existing 3 subtasks plus 2 additional ones focused on client data import/export functionality and GDPR compliance features.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves standard CRUD operations with moderate complexity. The existing 3 subtasks cover core functionality, but additional subtasks for data portability and privacy compliance would complete the implementation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Create Appointment Scheduling System' task into 5 subtasks focusing on calendar interface development, appointment request workflow, notification integration, external calendar synchronization, and conflict management.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Scheduling systems involve complex state management, calendar integration, and conflict resolution. This task requires both frontend calendar components and backend scheduling logic with notifications.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Client-Facing Showcase Interface' task into 5 subtasks focusing on responsive layout development, interactive property galleries, property comparison tools, client feedback mechanisms, and mobile optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This client-facing interface is critical to the application's success and requires sophisticated UI components, responsive design, and interactive elements. It has high complexity due to UX requirements and performance considerations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Develop Analytics and Tracking System' task into 4 subtasks focusing on event tracking implementation, data visualization dashboard, reporting functionality, and privacy-compliant data management.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Analytics systems require both frontend tracking implementation and backend data processing. This task involves event tracking, data aggregation, visualization, and reporting with privacy considerations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Notification System' task into 4 subtasks focusing on notification infrastructure, delivery channels (in-app, email, SMS), preference management, and real-time notifications.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple notification channels and delivery mechanisms. It has moderate complexity with dependencies on several other systems for triggering notifications.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Create Property Status Management System' task into 3 subtasks focusing on status workflow implementation, history tracking, and integration with showcase and notification systems.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves state management with moderate complexity. The workflow logic is straightforward but requires careful integration with other components of the system.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Agency Branding System' task into 3 subtasks focusing on branding asset management, theme customization interface, and showcase integration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task is primarily UI-focused with moderate complexity. It involves asset management, theme customization, and integration with the showcase system.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Develop System Administration Interface' task into 4 subtasks focusing on user/role management, system configuration, monitoring dashboard, and audit logging.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Admin interfaces require secure implementation of system-wide controls. This task has moderate complexity with various administrative functions and security considerations.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Expansion Framework for Additional Property Types
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Expansion Framework for Additional Property Types' task into 4 subtasks focusing on data model refactoring, UI component adaptation, search/filter enhancement, and migration tools.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This architectural task requires significant refactoring to support extensibility. It has high complexity due to its impact across the entire application and need for backward compatibility.
